= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Heart - NE receptors of atrium muscles (heart-symp-control)*: increase overall activity of heart
  * *Heart - upper cardiac muscle (heart-cardiac-upper-muscle)*: increase spontaneous diastonic muscle cells depolarization; increase matabolic demands of heart
  * *Heart - lower cardiac muscle (heart-cardiac-lower-muscle)*: increase heart rate (chronotropic effect) and force of cardiac contraction (inotropic effect)
  * *Heart - ACh receptors of atrium muscles (heart-psymp-control)*: decrease firing rate of SA node, slowing transmission of pacemaker impulse
  * *Heart - baroreceptors in aorta (heart-aorta-baroreceptors)*: increase in blood pressure signal
  * *Heart - baroreceptors in carotid artery (heart-carotid-baroreceptors)*: increase in blood pressure signal
  * *Heart - visceral receptors (heart-visceral)*: temperature and pain
